Title: Creates the women and high-wage, high-demand, nontraditional jobs grant program; appropriation
Summary: Creates the women and high-wage, high-demand, nontraditional jobs grant program; encourages and assists women to enter high-wage, high-demand occupations including but not limited to trades, science, technology, engineering, and math; makes an appropriation therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to creating the women and high-wage, high-demand, nontraditional jobs grant program; and making an appropriation therefor
